features: 💡 Brightness 💡 Set up a home office, SKYLEO LED desk lamp with 1300 lumens(112 Pcs Lamp Beads), different brightness(3000~6000K) and tones and that it came with an 5V/2A adapter to plug into a power strip or wall outlet. And CRI>90

💡 Size 💡 All parts of the LED lamp can move and adjusted, swing arm stand up to a maximum working height of approx 33", even the desk lamps head(16.5" in length)part can be rotated to avoid bright light straight to your eyes, wide range of motion.

💡 Install 💡 The lamp for desk itself was easy to assemble and clamp(2.5"). Very convenient for home desk. Latches onto the edge of the desk which frees up space. The arms extend and rotate as needed. Not just for a desk lamp, but the light to the ceiling and use it as a dim room light as for when the baby is sleeping.
💡 Operation Control 💡 The desk lamps for home office is easy to use,the touch button works perfect every time. The touch button to switch between brightness levels is very cool.

💡 Timer & Memory 💡 When the timer function is touched, the blue indicator lights up and the lamp will automatically turn off after 45 minutes and remain at your last brightness setting the next time you turn it on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Takes 10 seconds to set it. And it lights up great. Love the features of different light and lighting levels. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good lamp for price
reviews.reviewText: I like this light. Easy to attach to the desk in my husband's closet office. Highly recommended to brighten a dark space or work area. I like that you can change the light settings with the control switch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for a basic setup
reviews.reviewText: Bright enough for casual use. The buttons are sensors, so they are finicky to use and can sometimes be activated by accident. However, for aesthetics, it is second to none. The arms are sturdy enough and the LEDs are bright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased two lamps. Use them on both ends of a floor hand quilting frame. The light is easily adjustable to be the best light for quilting. The on/off & lighting change buttons are easy to use with a light touch. I think it would be great to use for putting jigsaw puzzles together as it could be clamped on the table edge. I would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is exactly what we needed to add light to a working kitchen station without being in the way. It's versatile in movementand lighting options, and has a timer which is good especially for dim lighting at night. We purchased two and appreciate the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Switch is unusable
reviews.reviewText: The light itself is exactly what I expected. It works just fine. The arm is pretty cheap but you get what you pay for and it is perfectly fine. But the switch is the worst piece of engineering I've ever seen! It uses touch sensitive switches on an integrated circuit but has 1/8 inch of plastic on the cover. unless the temperature of the room and your hand are hot enough the switch just doesn't work at all. It is December in Kansas and I had to hold my finger on the power switch for 20 seconds before anything happened. The mode switch would not work at all and then I couldn't turn it off or back on after unplugging. I'm a DIY guy so I popped the switch cover off and tested the switches and everything works just fine. After drilling holes in the cover and stilling having issues I just decided to keep the back half and use electrical tape to cover everything but the touch pads on the circuit board. Now it works as advertised. Would have been a 4 or even 5 star review if the switch wasn't so bad. As it is, don't buy this unless you live in a warm climate year round or you want to do what I did. Who tested this thing?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Turn lamp on/off with swipe of finger
reviews.reviewText: I needed a light for my office. I stumbled across this one and loved that I could attach it to my desk. This illuminates my work space beautifully. The different modes and brightness work great for my computer and paperwork.I read the reviews about the switch and was hesitate to buy this lamp, but it had all of the features that I wanted, so I tried it. The first day I was regretting it since I couldn't figure out how to turn the dang thing on or off when it somehow turned on. I was pushing on the switch to no end. After turning it on/off over a couple of days, I finally paid attention to what I was doing and realized that the switch is swipe controlled. All it takes is a swipe of a finger and I can now easily turn it on/off and change any settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good light, but a horrible switch
reviews.reviewText: Before buying I noticed other reviewers had written about the switch and I now realize I should have listened! The switch is not on the lamp head but on the cord, which is quite inconvenient, but worse, it is a touch-switch and a weird one to boot! It shuts itself off at irregular intervals and it does not remember the color setting. On the plus side, the light is even, bright and very adjustable, but still, dang annoying switch so I am returning it!A week later: I owe the company an apology. I had connected the lamp to a dimmer which clearly interfered with the lamp's touch switch. While the location of the cord mounted switch is still irritating, it does work pretty decent once you get used to it - and it does revert to the setting it had before turning it off.
Es macht Spaß, die verschiedenen Lichtfarben und Stärken auszuprobieren. Funktioniert einwandfrei, ist ausreichend stabil und formschön!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great light fairly big, but does the job love the settings and mode features. Perfect and does the job required.
Jag är helnöjd med lampan den gjorde min dag och inte alltför dyr ... ((Kenth))

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: easy to mount and handy to use and move
reviews.reviewText: i really like the fact that it takes zero space on the desk and it is freely movable, so you can make room in you need. you can easily change the tone of the light, dim the intensity, and also put a timer for late nights so it automatically shuts down. it doesn’t come with an adapter so you have to get one, or connect it to a usb hub.

Commandée deux fois , cette lampe fonctionne aléatoirement. Soit ne s allume pas ou a besoin d être débranchée plusieurs fois pour la réinitialiser. Quand elle fonctionne le module de commande tactile est capricieux aussi. Je ne recommande pas
